page.title: 03ECOLOGY IN HOLTON-LE-CLAY
page.content: A young man in our village tries to {conserve birds and hedgerows.}He has been conserving nature for five years and keeps an eye on the countryside surrounding the village. He likes what he is doing but it gets depressing when he sees the countryside starting to disappear. He keeps records of his work. He has seen a{redwing,}a{sparrow {hawk, barn owls, foxes, newts, frogs, {rabbits}and{weasels.}He has been in dispute with the council about not being told about building plans. As a result they have now postponed the removal of the hedgerows until August.He has seen{cowslips, cuckoo {flowers}and{giant hogweed}on the building site. He thinks it is a worthwhile thing to do because if nobody watches nature our birds, animals and flowers could disappear.
